fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • An article said the Swiss pharmaceutical company Roche was thought to be central to plans for a mass Covid-19 testing facility in Milton Keynes; in fact, Roche has told us that it is not involved in the hub (Britain’s testing shambles, 4 April, page 1 turning to page 4). • A picture captioned as showing “a police officer on Brighton beach” was actually taken in neighbouring Hove (The lockdown saves lives – but the backlash is growing, 7 April, page 3, Journal). • Other recently amended articles include: UK ministers accused of prioritising careers over lives of coronavirus victims NHS consultant dies from Covid-19 Can wearing gloves – like the Queen – help protect you against the coronavirus? Fears that people self-isolating with Covid-19 may seek help too late California megachurch linked to spread of more than 70 coronavirus cases Nicola Sturgeon reveals she asked chief medical officer to resign How did Spain get its coronavirus response so wrong? Lady Gaga, Billie Eilish and Paul McCartney to play coronavirus benefit
